description: "In the next 2-3 years, we will see this pace accelerating -- with indications that USIBC members are on track to invest an additional $45 billion, which is a conservative estimate," he added.
title: US companies to invest $45 billion more in India: John Chambers

description: On the controversy surrounding the GDP numbers based on new calculations, he said statisticians have done as good a job as they can and economic growth is significantly high.
title: Economy in right direction; need more animal spirit: Raghuram Rajan

description: India has extended its safeguard import taxes on some steel products until March 2018, in a bid to stop cheap overseas purchases from flooding its market.
title: Japan may seek WTO help to resolve India steel tariff dispute

description: Rajan, who has been outspoken on various issues, also praised Prime Minister Narendra Modi for ending government's interferences in public sector banks.
title: Long term desire to go back to academia: Raghuram Rajan

description: The leaders of the two countries resolved to pursue US- India Totalisation Agreement and enhance engagement on intellectual property rights.
title: India, US to expand economic relation, break down trade barriers

description: IMD’s second take offers a 73% probability of normal or above-normal monsoon (33% normal, 40% above normal), compared with 74% predicted in April.
title: Inflation would average 5% in fiscal 2017: Crisil Research

description: A panel headed by Finance Minister Arun Jaitley today took stock of the progress made on operationalising India's maiden sovereign wealth fund NIIF.
title: FM Arun Jaitley reviews sovereign wealth fund's status

description: In his address, Prime Minister Modi specifically spoke about India's defence sector and said this industry will be opened up further to domestic and overseas investment.
title: US innovation, Indian human resource a win-win combo: PM Narendra Modi

description: The bill aims to improve ease of doing business and facilitate investment leading to higher economic growth and development.
title: Parliamentary panel invites public comments on debt recovery laws

description: In last one year, the government has taken several measures to improve liquidity position of sugar mills enabling them to clear cane prices dues to farmers.
title: Sugarcane arrears down at Rs 6,225 crore

description: Rajan called current repo rate of 6.50 per cent "appropriate" and added the central bank has used up all its "space available" to cut interest rates.
title: Scope to cut rates if inflation heads to 5%: Raghuram Rajan

description: The freeze in export will prompt Brazil, Australia and United States to raise shipments and has pushed global prices to near their highest since August.
title: India cotton exports drop on thin supply pushing prices higher

description: These terms will have the same meaning as provided under Private Security Agencies (Regulation) (PSAR) Act, 2005, the 109-page compendium said.
title: Commerce & Industry Ministry releases annual FDI compendium

description: China's stiff regulations and industrial overcapacity may push India closer to US as Modi steps up efforts to hardsell New Delhi as Washington's new top biz partner.
title: India to pip China in race for Amreekan moolah

description: A senior government official told ET that NITI Aayog is preparing a market driven national energy policy to attract private investments.
title: ONGC, Coal India may not call the shots in energy market anymore
